typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
CasesAndDeathsSource filter(continent == "Europe") ~> FilterEuopeData
FilterEuopeData select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_3_digit = country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectRequiredColumns pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		year_week,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['cases', 'deaths']),
	count = sum(weekly_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
